creator: GlossGenius
descriptionHtml:
Where do you start when you want to manage and grow your business as a beauty professional? How can you focus on the things you love (beauty!) and worry less about the business stuff? GlossGenius is the premier all-in-one solution that makes it easy to book and schedule, manage clients, accept payments, track your business, market yourself, build a following...AND the beauty business you’ve dreamed of. We take care of the business stuff so YOU can take care of the beauty stuff.

FEATURES
GlossGenius has everything you need to start, manage and grow your business from your iPhone.

INDUSTRY’S EASIEST, MOST INTUITIVE PLATFORM
No training needed to use GlossGenius -- trust us, it’s that easy. GlossGenius will make your business look its best in seconds.

PROCESS PAYMENTS SEAMLESSLY WITH THE INDUSTRY’S LOWEST RATE
-The no set-up, no training, no hardware checkout solution that instantly integrates with your business data comes with the industry’s lowest rate of 2.6%.
- Next-day deposits
-Accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and AMEX.
-Customers pay, tip and sign right on your device.
-Record cash, gift cards, checks and other tenders.
-Customize your products and services with photos, names and prices.
-Send receipts through text message or email.

HAVE A PERSONAL ASSISTANT HELP YOU
GlossGenius offers an automated personal assistant whose job is to make you shine with reminders, confirmations, client notes and thank you’s. Build loyalty, stay fully booked and focus on what you love.

GET A STUNNING PERSONAL WEBSITE
In less than minutes, wow your clients with a luxurious, customized and super simple 24/7 online booking experience that will make them feel special and want to book you again and again. Show off your services, work and share more about yourself.

KNOW YOUR CLIENTS BETTER
We know your clients are everything to you and it’s tough to always stay on top of them. So we automatically save their history and notes and send them to you before their next appointment, so you can look like a genius.

SCHEDULE APPOINTMENTS IN SECONDS
With the industry’s fastest booking calendar, you can self-schedule, double book, book in 5, 10 or 15 minute increments, add processing time, add personal time off, view appointments by day, week or month, and more.

MARKET YOUR BUSINESS LIKE A PRO
We give you the industry's best, most advanced and easiest-to-use marketing tools to fuel your business so you can bring clients in. Access email marketing and text message marketing. No one else has got what we got!

KNOW YOUR NUMBERS
Finally, knowing how your business is doing is easy. In just a few taps, know how you’re doing, where you’re heading and what you need to change. Have all the information you need with reports when tax season rolls around.

UNPARALLELED 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your beauty business like it was our own. We’re the only platform to offer access to customer support through text, phone or email. We even help you transition all of your client and appointment data so there’s no downtime.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
PAYMENT INFORMATION
2.6%, THE INDUSTRY’S LOWEST RATE AND NEXT-DAY DEPOSITS
Charge $100, see $97.40 in your bank account. Accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express all at the same rate. No hidden fees, no key-in fees and no per-transaction fees. Plus you can customize how you split convenience fees with clients for an even lower rate.

NEXT-DAY DEPOSITS
Get your money automatically transferred to your bank account the next day.

NO HARDWARE REQUIRED. NO SET-UP. NO TRAINING.
Forget about hardware that always breaks. Process anything, anytime and anywhere, without any set-up, training or hardware.

SECURE AND TRUSTED
We use the same leading payment processor that other big companies like Twitter, Shopify, Lyft, Airbnb and many more use. All card information is encrypted from start to finish.
descriptionShort: All-in-one solution for independent beauty pros to manage & grow their business

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for using GlossGenius! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the Play Market regularly.

Every update of our app includes improvements for speed and reliability. As new features become available, we'll highlight those for you in the app and via email/text messages.

descriptionShort: All-in-one solution for independent beauty pros to manage & grow their business
title: GlossGenius

creator: GlossGenius
descriptionHtml:
The all-in-one, top booking, payments and marketing solution for teams and solopreneurs across the US. The GlossGenius booking app is trusted by tens of thousands of business owners for:

• Easy-to-use appointment scheduler and calendar planner
• Automated appointment scheduling
• Gorgeous customizable websites
• Client management tools
• Powerful marketing
• Same-business-day payment transfers
• Fast and stunning chip card readers
• Customizable client communication
And more!

Your clients' experience begins the moment they book with you, which is why we've designed the most stunning customizable booking site that you can set up in minutes.

GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.

WHY GLOSSGENIUS?

THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages.

A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.

MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.

UNLIMITED TEAM MEMBERS INCLUDED
As you grow your team we want to celebrate you for it - not charge you! Manage your business, staff and peace-of-mind in one place, for one simple, flat price. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings.

BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.

STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.

INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.

PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

“Nothing like sending these mass texts through glossgenius and having an appointment filled in less than 10 minutes. Working smarter not harder” - Skyler S

“No more hidden fees, no more paying extra for a specific time slot, no auto checkout, no more BS! I’ve tried a lot of other solutions and GLOSSGENIUS is hands down the best!” Megan H

“Obsessed with @glossgenius. This is a game changer for the industry, acts as your own personal assistant! I thought switching over was bold but it was so easy, they transferred all of my data from Square.” - The Wildflower Collective

“GlossGenius is one of my guests’ favorite experiences. It makes booking so much easier for them” - Kristina K

“After 24+ years of doing business by pencil and paper, it is refreshing to know that even I can operate the app. It’s so easy.” - Studio 13

“The best user interface for salons right now. I have been in the industry for 10 years and this is literally the best.” -Sharon O

“Moving over from Vagaro was seamless and faster than I even thought. Genius is an understatement” -Kathy R
descriptionShort: All-in-one solution for independent beauty pros to manage & grow their business

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're releasing a number of minor updates and fixes to make your experience even better:

We're fixing some issues causing the calendar to lag for GlossGenius Teams users.
We've added the application version number to the bottom of screens in Settings.

If you’re enjoying using GlossGenius, please consider leaving us a positive review or rating in the App Store since that helps us make the product even better! Thank you so much for your support, it’s so greatly appreciated. Gloss On!

GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.

WHY GLOSSGENIUS?

THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages.

A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.

MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.

UNLIMITED TEAM MEMBERS INCLUDED
As you grow your team we want to celebrate you for it - not charge you! Manage your business, staff and peace-of-mind in one place, for one simple, flat price. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings.

BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.

STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.

INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.

PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're releasing a number of minor updates and fixes to make your experience even better:

- Members can now choose to ask Clients for their pronouns in the booking form.
- Members can now specify a Client's pronouns in the client profile on the App.
- We've fixed several bugs causing the application to crash for some members.

title: GlossGenius

creator: GlossGenius
descriptionHtml:
The all-in-one, top booking, payments and marketing solution for teams and solopreneurs across the US. The GlossGenius booking app is trusted by tens of thousands of business owners for:

• Easy-to-use appointment scheduler and calendar planner
• Automated appointment scheduling
• Gorgeous customizable websites
• Client management tools
• Powerful marketing
• Same-business-day payment transfers
• Fast and stunning chip card readers
• Customizable client communication
And more!

Your clients' experience begins the moment they book with you, which is why we've designed the most stunning customizable booking site that you can set up in minutes.

GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.

WHY GLOSSGENIUS?

THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages.

A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.

MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.

UNLIMITED TEAM MEMBERS INCLUDED
As you grow your team we want to celebrate you for it - not charge you! Manage your business, staff and peace-of-mind in one place, for one simple, flat price. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings.

BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.

STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.

INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.

PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

“Nothing like sending these mass texts through glossgenius and having an appointment filled in less than 10 minutes. Working smarter not harder” - Skyler S

“Obsessed with @glossgenius. This is a game changer for the industry, acts as your own personal assistant! I thought switching over was bold but it was so easy, they transferred all of my data from Square.” - The Wildflower Collective

“GlossGenius is one of my guests’ favorite experiences. It makes booking so much easier for them” - Kristina K

“The best user interface for salons right now. I have been in the industry for 10 years and this is literally the best.” - Sharon O

“Moving over from Vagaro was seamless and faster than I even thought. Genius is an understatement” - Kathy R

title: GlossGenius

creator: GlossGenius
descriptionHtml:
The all-in-one, top booking, payments and marketing solution for teams and solopreneurs across the US. The GlossGenius booking app is trusted by tens of thousands of business owners for:

• Easy-to-use appointment scheduler and calendar planner
• Automated appointment scheduling
• Gorgeous customizable websites
• Client management tools
• Powerful marketing
• Same-business-day payment transfers
• Fast and stunning chip card readers
• Customizable client communication
And more!

Your clients' experience begins the moment they book with you, which is why we've designed the most stunning customizable booking site that you can set up in minutes.

GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.

WHY GLOSSGENIUS?

THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages.

A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.

MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.

UNLIMITED TEAM MEMBERS INCLUDED
As you grow your team we want to celebrate you for it - not charge you! Manage your business, staff and peace-of-mind in one place, for one simple, flat price. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings.

BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.

STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.

INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.

PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

“Nothing like sending these mass texts through glossgenius and having an appointment filled in less than 10 minutes. Working smarter not harder” - Skyler S

“Obsessed with @glossgenius. This is a game changer for the industry, acts as your own personal assistant! I thought switching over was bold but it was so easy, they transferred all of my data from Square.” - The Wildflower Collective

“GlossGenius is one of my guests’ favorite experiences. It makes booking so much easier for them” - Kristina K

“The best user interface for salons right now. I have been in the industry for 10 years and this is literally the best.” - Sharon O

“Moving over from Vagaro was seamless and faster than I even thought. Genius is an understatement” - Kathy R

• Easy-to-use appointment scheduler and calendar planner
• Automated appointment scheduling
• Gorgeous customizable websites
• Client management tools
• Powerful marketing
• Same-business-day payment transfers
• Fast and stunning chip card readers
• Customizable client communication
And more!

Your clients' experience begins the moment they book with you, which is why we've designed the most stunning customizable booking site that you can set up in minutes.

GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.

WHY GLOSSGENIUS?

THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages.

A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.

MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.

UNLIMITED TEAM MEMBERS INCLUDED
As you grow your team we want to celebrate you for it - not charge you! Manage your business, staff and peace-of-mind in one place, for one simple, flat price. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings.

BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.

STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.

INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.

PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

“Nothing like sending these mass texts through glossgenius and having an appointment filled in less than 10 minutes. Working smarter not harder” - Skyler S

“Obsessed with @glossgenius. This is a game changer for the industry, acts as your own personal assistant! I thought switching over was bold but it was so easy, they transferred all of my data from Square.” - The Wildflower Collective

“GlossGenius is one of my guests’ favorite experiences. It makes booking so much easier for them” - Kristina K

“The best user interface for salons right now. I have been in the industry for 10 years and this is literally the best.” - Sharon O

“Moving over from Vagaro was seamless and faster than I even thought. Genius is an understatement” - Kathy R
